mean_cn: n. 秃鹰，秃鹫，贪婪的人
mean_en: any one of several large birds that eat dead animals and have a small and featherless head
word_etyma: vult=voltur撕开 +ure表名词，事物，行为→把[猎物]撕开者→秃鹫
short_phrase: A vulture is a kind of bird.
sentence: Vultures chiefly feed on animal carcasses. What morbid taste!
sentence_trans: 秃鹰主要以动物尸体为食，好重口啊！
